thread.title: Starbucks CEO Ducks Question About Hiring Refugees Instead of Americans
thread.title_full: Starbucks CEO Ducks Question About Hiring Refugees Instead of Americans

author: Warner Todd Huston
title: Starbucks CEO Ducks Question About Hiring Refugees Instead of Americans
text: In this image taken on Monday, Feb. 27, 2017, Starbucks CEO Howard Schultz stands at the Princi bakery, in Milan, Italy. Longtime CEO Howard Schultz's vision for Starbucks was largely inspired by the Milan coffee bars he experienced on his first trip to the northern Italian city in 1983. Schultz will continue on with the company to open ''the quintessential Roastery'' in Milan by the end of 2018. (AP Photo/Luca Bruno)
